name: Hot Dog Gets Chewed Out at Work
article: Unable to sell supplemental insurance for the entire month of July 2013, Hot Dog is rebuked and reprimanded. The episode scars him such that the following March he incoroprates the event into a Sha Na Na-themed Dreams and Aspirations Journal, commissioned by a life coach.

nb_timestamp.nb: event is estimated to be the july prior to ADPPP#7, tipped during a dream sequence, of a sort

timestamp.name: Danny Mahoney Meets Jimmy Blades
timestamp.article: Danny Mahoney meets Jimmy Blades at a gay wedding to which he (Mahoney) was not invited. Overwhelmed by carrying around and replacing and maintaining 8 D batteries, Mahoney hired Blades to play music live at LOTPC parties.

nb_timestamp.nb: event is some time prior to ADPPP#6

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Scores Excess Sandwiches
timestamp.article: Don DiMello encounters a woman discarding sandwiches after a party, caters a podcast pilot with same.

nb_timestamp.nb: event is 1.5 days prior to ADPPP#5

timestamp.name: Mal Bachman and Don DiMello Spend a Weekend in Corona
timestamp.article: Following a raid on Lilly Hellman's play Children's Hour, Mal Bachman and Don DiMello hopped a train that left them in Corona, CA.

nb_timestamp.nb: event is the week prior to ADPPP#5 (but after Glengarry and after Children's Hour)

timestamp.name: Mal Bachman and Don DiMello Take in Equus.
timestamp.article: Excited by the premise, Bachman and DiMello return from Corona, CA to see 'Equus.'

nb_timestamp.nb: event is the week prior to ADPPP#5 (but after Glengarry and after ChildrensHour)

timestamp.name: Mal Bachman and Don DiMello Take in Lillian Hellman's The Children's Hour (eventually storing the stage with a broken bottles and a sharpened broom handle when it's revealed there is no hot lesbian action in the show).
timestamp.article: Disappointed with the death of sexual provocation in Glengarry Glen Ross, Bachman and DiMello see another show in the same week.

timestamp.name: Mal Bachman and Don DiMello Take in UCLA's Glengarry Glen Ross
timestamp.article: Bachman and DiMello are both unimpressed at how much of a sausage party the show is.

nb_timestamp.nb: event is the week prior to ADPPP#5

timestamp.article: Interested in reviewing somebody with a more 'incendiary' vision of theatre, Mal Bachman moves to California.

timestamp.article: Don DiMello witnessed the lines around the block for Home Alone and decided about childrens programming, "kids' stuff is where it's at."

timestamp.article: During a remote into ADPPP#4, little Kevin spoke his first words: 'He has a penis you can see.'

timestamp.article: On ADPPP#4 it was revealed that August Lindt's son had sat on yet another cat, whose 'brains came out its ears.'

timestamp.article: August Lindt vacations in Amsterdam 'one of a hundred times.'

timestamp.name: August Lindt Vacations in The Congo
timestamp.article: Challenged by his boss to visit the 'worst place he could think of,' Mr. Lindt traveled to the Emergency Room of the Jason Sendwe Hospital in Lubumbashi in the war-torn Katanga province of the Democratic Republic of Congo.

nb_timestamp.nb: likely some time in the year prior to ADPPP#4

timestamp.name: August Lindt travels to Skokie, Illinois.
timestamp.article: On ADPPP#4, during a round of 'How Close Have We Been to Skokie,' Mr. Lindt reveals that has, in fact, been to Skokie.

timestamp.name: Bill Carter's Platoon of Children is Caught in the Firebombing of Dresden
timestamp.article: On ADPPP#3, Bill Carter reveals to Jesse Ventura that a platoon of children he trained in New Mexico was accidentally bunkered in Dresden during the Allied aerial attack.

nb_timestamp.nb: two-day Dresden attack (plus a day early)

timestamp.name: Bill Carter Trains a Platoon of Children
timestamp.article: On ADPPP#3, Bill Carter reveals to Jesse Ventura that he trained a platoon of children in New Mexico meant to combat The Hitler Youth in World War II.

nb_timestamp.nb: somewhere between the start of wwii and the Dresden attack

timestamp.name: Bill Carter Does Top Secret Business in World War II
timestamp.article: On ADPPP#3, Bill Carter reveals to Jesse Ventura that he had done 'Top Secret business' back in World War II that is, as yet, still classified. He goes on to reveal that the work was primarily training an army of children in knife play and artillery as preparation for their expected battles with The Hitler Youth in Germany.

nb_timestamp.nb: entirety of wwii range

timestamp.name: Bill Carter Votes for Ross Perot
timestamp.article: Bill Carter votes for Ross Perot in the 1992 U.S. General Election. In subsequent years, Carter writes in Perot's name.

nb_timestamp.nb: 92 general election

timestamp.name: Prison Barge Riot of '79
timestamp.article: Due to an electrical grid blackout, all of the doors of the Int'l Waters Prison Barge swung open, causing mass casualties and escapes.

timestamp.article: During the Hollywood Honorary Mayoral race in 2014, Mr. Gardner and Ms. Channing faced off on a number of issues presumably important to the citizens of Hollywood.

timestamp.name: Try Not to Get Hit by These Hammers
timestamp.article: TNTGHBTH was a Chip Gardner production, staged live on ADPPP#2 in February 2014. Multiple victims were unable to avoid being, indeed, hit by hammers.

timestamp.name: Are You Smarter than a Room Full of Poisonous Snakes?
timestamp.article: AYSTARFOPS was a Chip Gardner production, staged live on ADPPP#2 in February 2014. Multiple victims were unable to answer a question about the office of Vice President.

timestamp.article: During a game of 'Houdini' played in their swimming pool, Chip Gardner's unnamed wife passes accidentally.

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner Enters a Dark Period
timestamp.article: Chip Gardner's Street Fighting Years began during the fallout from the cancellation of his show 'Just Stand Over There and Be Quiet.'

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose estimate acc. to ADPPP#2 - prior to being run over by a jeep in 1986

timestamp.name: A Contestant on "Where'd I Put My Jacket" Commits Suicide in the Parking Lot
timestamp.article: A contestant on the Chip Gardner game show, coming in destitute and really needing a hand, lost the virtually unwinnable competition by guessing 'New York' rather than 'a van circling the isle of Manhattan' and shortly thereafter committed suicide in the parking lot outside the studio.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose estimate acc. to ADPPP#2

timestamp.name: Dalton Wilcox Disrupts Cellular Service to Earwolf
timestamp.article: In order to ensure nobody (Russel Shein) can easily escape the Earwolf studios, Mr. Wilcox strapped dynamite to a nearby cellular tower and detonated.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose estimate acc. to ADPPP#9

timestamp.name: Dalton Wilcox Slays an Invisible Man
timestamp.article: Walking home from his local watering hole, Mr. Wilcox passed by a darkened alleyway. Hearing footsteps on the pavement, he was unable to see anybody. Knowing full well that it meant the steps belonged to 'a goddamned invisible man,' Wilcox pulled out his six-guns and shouted. As Wilcox approached, the invisible man put on a visible man disguise. Asked if he was an invisible man, the man 'basically confirmed it,' according to Wilcox who, on ADPPP#9, notes that "you won't *not* be seeing him anymore."

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is firm acc. to ADPPP#9

timestamp.name: Dalton Wilcox' Wive Passes
timestamp.article: Having turned into a werewolf, Mrs. Wilcox was shot dead with a silver bullet by Dalton himself.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose estimate, any time prior to ADPPP#1

timestamp.name: I, One Time, Killed a Frankenstein
timestamp.article: As detailed in his poem, 'I One Time Killed a Frankenstein,' Dalton Wilcox murdered a security guard who was attempting to stop him from shoplifting at a western supply store.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose estimate, any time prior to ADPPP#1

timestamp.name: Russel Shein Marries
timestamp.article: Twenty-five years prior to his wife's disappearance, Russel and Mrs. Shein were married.

timestamp.name: Russel Shein's Wife Disappears
timestamp.article: Some time in the night 13 years before ADPPP#1, Russel Shein's wife disappeared. Mr. Shein maintains she was abducted by skillful kidnappers who left behind almost no evidence (save her wedding ring on the bathroom sink).

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose estimate acc. to ADPPP#1

timestamp.name: Beck Landry is Laid to Rest
timestamp.article: Succumbing -- supposedly -- to injuries sustained by a railroad spike in a fistfight, Mr. Landry was buried in February 2014 without his own, dear cowboy hat.

timestamp.name: Russel Shein is Tricked onto ADPPP #1
timestamp.article: In February 2014, Dalton Wilcox baited Russel Shein onto his podcast pilot by promising information about the disappearance of his wife some 13 years prior.

timestamp.name: Russel Shein is Tricked onto ADPPP #9

timestamp.name: Joe Bongo is Involved in a Car Accident
timestamp.article: Joe Bongo is involved in the most expensive car accident in the history of Marina del Rey. Listed among the destroyed properties is the historic lighthouse (rendering the Marina particularly dangerous); the dog run at Burton Chace Park; Mr. Bongo's car; the dashcam therein. The incident cost him his position as Driver's Ed instructor at MDRHS.

timestamp.article: In order to protect against fans that grow angry when he appears without his trademark bongos, Mr. Bongo visited an unnamed emergency room and requested preventative thigh-high casts put on both legs.

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Presents: True West
timestamp.article: Over the fall of 2011, Mr. DiMello teamed with actors John C. Reilly and Nick Nolte to launch a production of Sam Shepard's 'True West' to be staged in a VFW hall in Death Valley, California. The show evidently never made it due to the actors' objections to some of Mr. DiMello's tactics -- kidnapping and cuckolding -- as well as his insistence that beautiful women do a sexy dance in a tandem horse costume, followed by a simulated live birth, followed by foreplay.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is acc. to release date of SuperEgo 3.8

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Meets Marissa Wompler
timestamp.article: In the women's bathroom at Marina del Rey High School (during a production of 'Grease'), Don DiMello eschewed the men's bathroom due to a funky smell and met Ms. Wompler in the ladies' room. Mr. DiMello slipped a note under the stall to the 16 year-old that read, 'Do you wanna have some fun?'

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is acc. to ADPPP#5, research shows a Grease event at Venice High (MDRHS) on June 1 2012 -- https://patch.com/california/venice/venice-high-school-aka-rydell-high-to-host-2nd-greasefd7aa4eef9

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Presents: Hey, Really Giger!
timestamp.article: Over the summer of 2011, Mr. DiMello teamed with H.R. Giger and Andrew Lloyd Webber to develop and produce a stage show, tentatively titled 'Hey, Really Giger!' about 'the eternal struggle between the darkness and the light.' The show was never produced due to disagreements over whether to feature premeditated murder of mouthy women during the show and whether to plagiarize an 'Annie Get Your Gun'/'Annie' mashup Giger himself had sketched.

Mr. Gardner did not make it to shore, having been occupied forevermore by Satan himself.

The show failed to reach denouement.

timestamp.name: Cecelia Wilcox is Murdered
timestamp.article: According to an uncited article Jason Mantzoukas read on-air in #CBB148, Cecelia Wilcox and her three daughters were killed a year before 2012.March.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is acc. to CBB#148

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner is Profiled by the L.A. Times
timestamp.article: In it, it is revealed that he had purchased ancient Victorian surgical instruments and was performing surgeries on schizophrenics and homeless people. Next to the piece was a mysterious article about the 28 contentants from the long-canceled game show 'Zap' who have disappeared.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - acc. to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner Hits Rock Bottom and Embraces Satan
timestamp.article: In approximately 1996 (well after his face was run over by a Jeep and at least a day after the airing of Friends episode s1e10) Chip Gardner hits rock bottom and embraces the Dark Lord Satan.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - after the jeep incident and after Marcel the monkey Friends episode acc. to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner Hosts the Live Gameshow 'Zap' from 2-3 AM
timestamp.article: Chip Gardner's show before his 'Catch a Predator' precursor was a kids education show called 'Zap' that featured 'real sleepy kids,' some of whom would later become famous but most of whom simply disappeared.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - after the jeep incident acc. to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner's Face is Run Over by a Jeep on the PCH
timestamp.article: Chip Gardner was lying on the Pacific Coast Highway 'trying to get run over by something' (later he admitted he wanted it to be a Monto Carlo) in order to 'see what I could survive' when an oncoming Jeep (driven, coincidentally by Scott Aukerman and Jason Mantzoukas) ran over his face only. It was during reconstructive surgery that he was accidentally given sexual reassignment surgery and became a Side-by-Side named Gretchen.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - acc. to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner Follows Simple Minds on Tour
timestamp.article: Chip Gardner followed Simple Minds around on tour in ~1991 after the band had crested and ended up opening for Jesus Jones.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - some date after the release of Jesus Jones' Right Here Right Now acc. to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Chip Gardner Moves to Hollywood
timestamp.article: Chip Gardner moved to Hollywood as a young man to become an actor and immediately got 'lost' in drugs and alcohol and streetfighting.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - some date in 1980 according to CBB#131

timestamp.name: Andi Callahan Gets His Hands on an Ape
timestamp.article: Andi Callahan, with the assistance of Cactus Tony, manages to gain stewardship of an ape. The experiments that ensued caused an interest in human experimentation to grow in both men, leading to Callahan's life and career in medicine and Tony's thwarted interest in pediatrics.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose approximation - relative to Callahan's life story as told on CBB#119

timestamp.name: Andi Callahan's Parents Die in a Fire
timestamp.article: During the course of a 'heat cure' administered by Andi Callahan and Cactus Tony, Andi's parents are burned alive in an abandoned house.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose approximation - relative to Callahan's life story as told on CBB#119

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Stages 'Cinderella' at the Pasadena Fairytale Theatre
timestamp.article: The show was 'not your typical garbage,' according to Mr. DiMello, and featured a number of liberties taken in the interpretation of the classic story including an extra sister and considerable nudity. Cinderella was triple-cast and spoke simultaneously. The show failed to reach denouement.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a tight approximation - 'next weekend' relative to CBB#99

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Accidentally Joins The Taliban
timestamp.article: In Bahrain studying safe decapitation techniques, Mr. DiMello 'got to talking to some guys' and accidentally joins a terrorist organization.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a very loose approximation - 'years' prior to ADPPP#5

timestamp.name: Don DiMello Stages 'Disneys Beauty and the Beast' in a Church Basement in Connecticut
timestamp.article: The production featured live animals and failed to reach denouement. It ran 18 months and received 'scathing' reviews. Police were involved.

timestamp.article: He put out the word that, out by the lake, there's going to be 1 wet girl and 8 dry girls (one of them in a fake beard).

timestamp.name: Danny Mahoney Wears a Heavy Coat Into the Ocean

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is approximate - winter prior to CBB##14

timestamp.article: As a method for building up tolerance to the material, Danny drove his brother around in an asbestos in increasingly long iterations. The brother eventually perished (of an 'insulated heart'), to be survived at least by his son Bertrand.
timestamp.name: Danny Mahoney Immunizes His Brother to Asbestos

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is approximate - some time prior to the hostile takeover of the plumbing business

timestamp.article: Danny Mahoney, drunk, falls asleep for three days in the back of a shipping container. Accounts later differ, but the event likely at least *contributed* to the hostile takeover, by Bertram Mahoney, of their shared plumbing business.
timestamp.name: Danny Mahoney Falls Asleep for Three Days

timestamp.name: Ashley Pinto's Sweet Sixteen
Crystal Alterman Marries Big Bob Pinto
timestamp.article: Against the wishes of father Ben Alterman, Crystal and Big Bob were married at an undisclosed location at an undisclosed time. In his toast, Ben revealed he'd watch his daughter fuck almost anyone but Big Bob.
